posts.title: Strong Start to Spring Season
posts.excerpt: Reflecting on the first few games of the spring season and looking ahead to upcoming tournaments.
posts.content: The spring season has gotten off to a great start with solid performances both at the plate and in the field. Looking forward to showcasing skills at upcoming tournaments and connecting with college coaches.

posts.title: Academic Excellence Recognition
posts.excerpt: Honored to receive academic recognition while maintaining focus on athletic development.
posts.content: Balancing academics and athletics continues to be a priority. Proud to maintain high academic standards while pursuing softball excellence.

posts.title: Winter Training Update
posts.excerpt: Focused on strength and skill development during the off-season training period.
posts.content: The winter training period has been productive with focused work on strength development, hitting mechanics, and defensive skills. Excited to apply these improvements in the upcoming season.

posts.title: Recruiting Process Insights
posts.excerpt: Sharing thoughts on the college recruiting journey and connecting with coaching staffs.
posts.content: The recruiting process has been an incredible learning experience. Grateful for the opportunity to connect with college coaches and explore programs that align with both athletic and academic goals.
